casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2003-0825. Edgell v. Monroe Guar. Ins. Co.

Muskingum App. No. CT20020008, 2003-0hio-1666. Discretionary appeal allowed and cause held for the decision in 2002-1126 and 2002-1433, Allen v. Johnson, Wayne App. Nos. 01CA0046 and 01CA0047, 2002-0hio-3404; briefing schedule stayed. ■

Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
